title: Missing Support Ticket
body: I sent a support ticket yesterday and this morning when I went to check the support ticket it didn't show up under My Tickets. It's like it was just deleted with no reply or anything. Any idea what happened?

replies.body: You'll need to be logged into the ticketing center to view your ticket, unless you filled out an account recovery form.  In that case, we'll send you an email directly instead.  This is to help you in case anyone with unauthorized access is trying to access your tickets too.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nhGL9EJH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-01T15:15:39.618+0000)
>
> You'll need to be logged into the ticketing center to view your ticket, unless you filled out an account recovery form.  In that case, we'll send you an email directly instead.  This is to help you in case anyone with unauthorized access is trying to access your tickets too.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Unfortunately not one bit. lol

I checked again to see if my ticket was there and it isn't showing up. None of my tickets are showing.

The only way I can get to my tickets is through email.
I am having the same problem, I asked why a guy who spammed my team to "kys" wasn't punished. Looks like Riot just deleted the tickets.
Reach out to us through email instead so we can get more context privately and figure out what's going on.  We can be reached via support@riotgames.com.
